studentspec

Interface StudentSpec.StudentValidatorSpec

  • Enclosing interface:
    StudentSpec

    public static interface StudentSpec.StudentValidatorSpec

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • validateSID

        StudentSpec.ValidationStatus validateSID(java.lang.String theSID)
        Validate the student's SID. The supplied value must be a string of length 9 and be all digits.
        Parameters:
        theSID - - the value being validated
        Returns:
        signal indicating the result of validating the supplied value

      • validateFirstName

        StudentSpec.ValidationStatus validateFirstName(java.lang.String theFirstName)
        Validate the student's first name. The supplied value must be a string at least one character in length.
        Parameters:
        theFirstName - - the value being validated
        Returns:
        signal indicating the result of validating the supplied value

      • validateMiddleInitial

        StudentSpec.ValidationStatus validateMiddleInitial(java.lang.String theMiddleInitial)
        Validate the student's middle initial. If the supplied value is null or an empty string, the middle initial is set to an empty string; if the supplied value is a length of one or greater, the middle initial is set to the first character of the supplied string.
        Parameters:
        theMiddleInitial - - the value being validated
        Returns:
        signal indicating the result of validating the supplied value

      • validateLastName

        StudentSpec.ValidationStatus validateLastName(java.lang.String theLastName)
        Validate the student's last name. The supplied value must be a string at least one character in length.
        Parameters:
        theLastName - - the value being validated
        Returns:
        signal indicating the result of validating the supplied value

      • validateMajor

        StudentSpec.ValidationStatus validateMajor(java.lang.String theMajor)
        Validate the student's major. The supplied value must be a string of length 3.
        Parameters:
        theMajor - - the value being validated
        Returns:
        signal indicating the result of validating the supplied value

      • validateGPAIngredients

        StudentSpec.ValidationStatus validateGPAIngredients(double theTotalDegreeCredits,
                                                    double theTotalQualityPoints)
        Validate the student's total degree credits and total quality points. The supplied values must be non-negative, and when used to calculate GPA must produce a value between MIN_GPA and MAX_GPA.
        Parameters:
        theTotalDegreeCredits - - the value being validated as total degree credits
        theTotalQualityPoints - - the value being validated as total quality points
        Returns:
        signal indicating the result of validating the supplied value
